price: ߒ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߡߐ߱ ߘߊ߲߫ ߢߣߊߕߐߡߐ߲ߠߌ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߓߐ߱ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min sulālatin min ṭīnin
